Franklin.Oak Hall (Brentwood, Tennessee):
Oak Hall is a building and property on Wilson Pike in Brentwood, Tennessee that dates from 1845 and was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1986. It has also been known as Century Oak.
It was built by Thomas Wilson, an early settler of Williamson County and namesake of Wilson Pike, who had originally built a log home, then had built Ravenswood in 1825.
